sentences.sContent: We helped the farmers to pick apples.
sentences.sCn: 我们帮助农民们摘苹果。

sentences.sContent: People like to go to farms in the countryside and pick apples.
sentences.sContent_eng: People like to go to farms in the countryside and pick apples.
sentences.sCn: 人们喜欢去郊区的农场摘苹果。

sentences.sContent: As an adult, I do my best to take my 9- and 7-year-old nieces every year on the same hay rides through the apple orchards I visited to pick apples when I was their age.
sentences.sContent_eng: As an adult, I do my best to take my 9- and 7-year-old nieces every year on the same hay rides through the apple orchards I visited to pick apples when I was their age.
sentences.sCn: 成年之后，我每年都会尽量带上自己9岁和7岁的侄子开车经过一片苹果园，在他们这个年纪的时候，我曾在这里参观过并摘过苹果。
